{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DI-624+ |revision=rev A |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/11/2003 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model=GL2454RT-IA1 |manuf_rev=T2.0 |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2T1130,O7J-GL2454MP-0T |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Brecis |cpu1_model=MSP2007 |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800ABTC-90 |fla1_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V643220CT-6 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Global Sun GL2454MP-0T |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Radia |wi1_chip2_model=RC2422B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=ThreadX |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''AirPlus G+ Wireless Router'''
This router primarily seems to have been sold in locations other than the US. :There are many of these devices on eBay Germany.
*[http://www.kilgus.net/hacking/di624p.html ''Hacking - D-Link DI-624+'' on '''kilgus.net'''] :"GL2454RT-IA1-B10 T2.0" is silkscreened on the board. :The device has an ''Altera'' EPM3032A PLD on-board. :The RTOS used in the D-Link firmware is ''ThreadX''. *[http://www.vallstedt-networks.de/Forum/viewtopic.php?t=3206 Shots of the wireless module (''Global Sun'' GL2454MP-0T)] (archived below) :The original ''Global Sun'' FCC ID of the wireless module has been assigned to this device.
CPU: [[Brecis]] MSP2007 @166MHz
==Images== <gallery caption="from D-Link" widths="300px" heights="300px"> File:D-Link DI-624+.jpg|main </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
<gallery caption="wireless module"> File:Global Sun GL2454MP-0T top.jpg|top File:Global Sun GL2454MP-0T back.JPG|bottom </gallery>
